attributes.action: Close all uk schools asap and mass gatherings like concerts and go into lockdown
attributes.additional_details: To stop the spread of the coronavirus and protect our kids and elderly
attributes.background: Close all uk schools, mass gatherings, concerts and go into lockdown

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has closed all schools and colleges to most students, and banned gatherings of more than two people.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
